PackageOracle.name: DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN
/* Generated on 11-FEB-15 05.09.52.614146000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,namespace_id IN NUMBER
,login_root_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_name_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,encryption_key_txt IN VARCHAR2
,password_txt IN RAW
,login_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,login_expiration_dt IN DATE
,last_login_dt IN DATE
,last_login_ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,failed_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,remaining_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,login_role_nm IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_val IN VARCHAR2
,lock_expiration_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,cpni_compliant_ind IN VARCHAR2
,cpni_compliant_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,encryption_algorithm_cd IN VARCHAR2
,email_administration_policy_nm IN VARCHAR2
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,last_login_ip_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,namespace_id IN NUMBER
,login_root_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_name_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,encryption_key_txt IN VARCHAR2
,password_txt IN RAW
,login_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,login_expiration_dt IN DATE
,last_login_dt IN DATE
,last_login_ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,failed_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,remaining_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,login_role_nm IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_val IN VARCHAR2
,lock_expiration_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,cpni_compliant_ind IN VARCHAR2
,cpni_compliant_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,encryption_algorithm_cd IN VARCHAR2
,email_administration_policy_nm IN VARCHAR2
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,last_login_ip_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,namespace_id IN NUMBER
,login_root_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_name_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,encryption_key_txt IN VARCHAR2
,password_txt IN RAW
,login_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,login_expiration_dt IN DATE
,last_login_dt IN DATE
,last_login_ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,failed_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,remaining_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,login_role_nm IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_val IN VARCHAR2
,lock_expiration_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,cpni_compliant_ind IN VARCHAR2
,cpni_compliant_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,encryption_algorithm_cd IN VARCHAR2
,email_administration_policy_nm IN VARCHAR2
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,last_login_ip_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_customer_login;

body.name: DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CUSTOMER_LOGIN
/* Generated on 11-FEB-15 05.09.52.642680000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,namespace_id IN NUMBER
,login_root_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_name_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,encryption_key_txt IN VARCHAR2
,password_txt IN RAW
,login_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,login_expiration_dt IN DATE
,last_login_dt IN DATE
,last_login_ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,failed_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,remaining_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,login_role_nm IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_val IN VARCHAR2
,lock_expiration_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,cpni_compliant_ind IN VARCHAR2
,cpni_compliant_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,encryption_algorithm_cd IN VARCHAR2
,email_administration_policy_nm IN VARCHAR2
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,last_login_ip_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login.add(fx), parms=' || account_id || '|' || namespace_id || '|' || login_root_nm || '|' || login_nm || '|' || login_name_status_cd || '|' || encryption_key_txt || '|' || password_txt || '|' || login_status_cd || '|' || login_expiration_dt || '|' || last_login_dt || '|' || last_login_ip_address_id || '|' || failed_login_attempt_cnt || '|' || remaining_login_attempt_cnt || '|' || login_role_nm || '|' || contact_verification_cd || '|' || contact_verification_val || '|' || lock_expiration_dttm || '|' || cpni_compliant_ind || '|' || cpni_compliant_dttm || '|' || encryption_algorithm_cd || '|' || email_administration_policy_nm || '|' || access_method_id || '|' || last_login_ip_address || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer_login a
(
a.customer_login_id
,a.account_id
,a.namespace_id
,a.login_root_nm
,a.login_nm
,a.login_name_status_cd
,a.encryption_key_txt
,a.password_txt
,a.login_status_cd
,a.login_expiration_dt
,a.last_login_dt
,a.last_login_ip_address_id
,a.failed_login_attempt_cnt
,a.remaining_login_attempt_cnt
,a.login_role_nm
,a.contact_verification_cd
,a.contact_verification_val
,a.lock_expiration_dttm
,a.cpni_compliant_ind
,a.cpni_compliant_dttm
,a.encryption_algorithm_cd
,a.email_administration_policy_nm
,a.access_method_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.last_login_ip_address
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_customer_login_id.NEXTVAL
,add.account_id
,add.namespace_id
,add.login_root_nm
,add.login_nm
,add.login_name_status_cd
,add.encryption_key_txt
,add.password_txt
,add.login_status_cd
,add.login_expiration_dt
,add.last_login_dt
,add.last_login_ip_address_id
,add.failed_login_attempt_cnt
,add.remaining_login_attempt_cnt
,add.login_role_nm
,add.contact_verification_cd
,add.contact_verification_val
,add.lock_expiration_dttm
,add.cpni_compliant_ind
,add.cpni_compliant_dttm
,add.encryption_algorithm_cd
,add.email_administration_policy_nm
,add.access_method_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.last_login_ip_address
) RETURNING a.customer_login_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,account_id IN NUMBER
,namespace_id IN NUMBER
,login_root_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_name_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,encryption_key_txt IN VARCHAR2
,password_txt IN RAW
,login_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,login_expiration_dt IN DATE
,last_login_dt IN DATE
,last_login_ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,failed_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,remaining_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,login_role_nm IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_val IN VARCHAR2
,lock_expiration_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,cpni_compliant_ind IN VARCHAR2
,cpni_compliant_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,encryption_algorithm_cd IN VARCHAR2
,email_administration_policy_nm IN VARCHAR2
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,last_login_ip_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login.add, parms=' || account_id || '|' || namespace_id || '|' || login_root_nm || '|' || login_nm || '|' || login_name_status_cd || '|' || encryption_key_txt || '|' || password_txt || '|' || login_status_cd || '|' || login_expiration_dt || '|' || last_login_dt || '|' || last_login_ip_address_id || '|' || failed_login_attempt_cnt || '|' || remaining_login_attempt_cnt || '|' || login_role_nm || '|' || contact_verification_cd || '|' || contact_verification_val || '|' || lock_expiration_dttm || '|' || cpni_compliant_ind || '|' || cpni_compliant_dttm || '|' || encryption_algorithm_cd || '|' || email_administration_policy_nm || '|' || access_method_id || '|' || last_login_ip_address || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer_login a
(
a.customer_login_id
,a.account_id
,a.namespace_id
,a.login_root_nm
,a.login_nm
,a.login_name_status_cd
,a.encryption_key_txt
,a.password_txt
,a.login_status_cd
,a.login_expiration_dt
,a.last_login_dt
,a.last_login_ip_address_id
,a.failed_login_attempt_cnt
,a.remaining_login_attempt_cnt
,a.login_role_nm
,a.contact_verification_cd
,a.contact_verification_val
,a.lock_expiration_dttm
,a.cpni_compliant_ind
,a.cpni_compliant_dttm
,a.encryption_algorithm_cd
,a.email_administration_policy_nm
,a.access_method_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.last_login_ip_address
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_customer_login_id.NEXTVAL
,add.account_id
,add.namespace_id
,add.login_root_nm
,add.login_nm
,add.login_name_status_cd
,add.encryption_key_txt
,add.password_txt
,add.login_status_cd
,add.login_expiration_dt
,add.last_login_dt
,add.last_login_ip_address_id
,add.failed_login_attempt_cnt
,add.remaining_login_attempt_cnt
,add.login_role_nm
,add.contact_verification_cd
,add.contact_verification_val
,add.lock_expiration_dttm
,add.cpni_compliant_ind
,add.cpni_compliant_dttm
,add.encryption_algorithm_cd
,add.email_administration_policy_nm
,add.access_method_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.last_login_ip_address
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,account_id IN NUMBER
,namespace_id IN NUMBER
,login_root_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_nm IN VARCHAR2
,login_name_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,encryption_key_txt IN VARCHAR2
,password_txt IN RAW
,login_status_cd IN VARCHAR2
,login_expiration_dt IN DATE
,last_login_dt IN DATE
,last_login_ip_address_id IN NUMBER
,failed_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,remaining_login_attempt_cnt IN NUMBER
,login_role_nm IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_cd IN VARCHAR2
,contact_verification_val IN VARCHAR2
,lock_expiration_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,cpni_compliant_ind IN VARCHAR2
,cpni_compliant_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,encryption_algorithm_cd IN VARCHAR2
,email_administration_policy_nm IN VARCHAR2
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,last_login_ip_address IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login.add, parms=' || customer_login_id || '|' || account_id || '|' || namespace_id || '|' || login_root_nm || '|' || login_nm || '|' || login_name_status_cd || '|' || encryption_key_txt || '|' || password_txt || '|' || login_status_cd || '|' || login_expiration_dt || '|' || last_login_dt || '|' || last_login_ip_address_id || '|' || failed_login_attempt_cnt || '|' || remaining_login_attempt_cnt || '|' || login_role_nm || '|' || contact_verification_cd || '|' || contact_verification_val || '|' || lock_expiration_dttm || '|' || cpni_compliant_ind || '|' || cpni_compliant_dttm || '|' || encryption_algorithm_cd || '|' || email_administration_policy_nm || '|' || access_method_id || '|' || last_login_ip_address || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer_login a
(
a.customer_login_id
,a.account_id
,a.namespace_id
,a.login_root_nm
,a.login_nm
,a.login_name_status_cd
,a.encryption_key_txt
,a.password_txt
,a.login_status_cd
,a.login_expiration_dt
,a.last_login_dt
,a.last_login_ip_address_id
,a.failed_login_attempt_cnt
,a.remaining_login_attempt_cnt
,a.login_role_nm
,a.contact_verification_cd
,a.contact_verification_val
,a.lock_expiration_dttm
,a.cpni_compliant_ind
,a.cpni_compliant_dttm
,a.encryption_algorithm_cd
,a.email_administration_policy_nm
,a.access_method_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.last_login_ip_address
)
VALUES
(
add.customer_login_id
,add.account_id
,add.namespace_id
,add.login_root_nm
,add.login_nm
,add.login_name_status_cd
,add.encryption_key_txt
,add.password_txt
,add.login_status_cd
,add.login_expiration_dt
,add.last_login_dt
,add.last_login_ip_address_id
,add.failed_login_attempt_cnt
,add.remaining_login_attempt_cnt
,add.login_role_nm
,add.contact_verification_cd
,add.contact_verification_val
,add.lock_expiration_dttm
,add.cpni_compliant_ind
,add.cpni_compliant_dttm
,add.encryption_algorithm_cd
,add.email_administration_policy_nm
,add.access_method_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.last_login_ip_address
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_login_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer_login.del, parms=' || customer_login_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_customer_login a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.customer_login_id = del.customer_login_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer_login.del');

END del;

END da_customer_login;
